about_the_game:
This is a Pre Alpha Demo of MechAnimals, the upcoming action roguelike by solodev Guy Bareli. It is a small vertical slice meant to give players a taste of what's to come. 

MechAnimals lets you play one of four little critters (a cat, a penguin, a teddy bear, and a bionic chick) and call upon their mighty steam powered mechs to battle against evil. procedurally generated robots. It's Hades meets Mario 3D World... but with Mechs!

The demo will feature a single playable level (with random enemies and upgrades), which will take a few tries to complete, single player / up to 4P co-op locally or using 'remote play', and a PvP mode featuring a series of hilarious training arenas.



Key Gameplay Elements:

  • Go Tiny or Go Mech: Players can seamlessly switch between fast critter combat and powerful mech attacks.

  • Solo Crusade or Co-op Action: Players can embark on missions solo or bring along up to three friends for multiplayer action, offering varied play styles to suit all preferences.

  • Unlockable Mechs: Complete runs to unlock different types of mechs, each with its own unique playstyle and signature moves. The demo will feature 2 mech types.

  • PvP: Battle with up to three friends in the Sparring Arena to see who reigns supreme!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 260X (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 15 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

short_description: Try out a vertical slice of MechAnimals, an upcoming action roguelike from Kung Fu Panda / Mario Movie artist turned solodev Guy Bareli, featuring cute tiny animal Mech Pilots!
